bioAsHtml: Philippe Gregoire's job at IBM is to conduct technical enablement for Independent Software Vendors on the IBM portfolio. His main areas of focus are currently IoT, robotics, Analytics, within a Cloud environment. Philippe is also a DIY hobbyist in the domains of home IoT and 3D printing.

acceptedTalks.track: Big Data, Machine Learning, IA & Analytics
acceptedTalks.title: IoT to Analytics Hands-On Lab with real mini-street lamp device.

bio:
Philippe Gregoire's job at IBM is to conduct technical enablement for  Independent Software Vendors on the IBM portfolio.
His main areas of focus are currently IoT, robotics, Analytics, within a Cloud environment.
Philippe is also a DIY hobbyist in the domains of home IoT and 3D printing.
